text: In geology, anorogenic magmatism is the formation, intrusion or eruption of magmas not directly connected with orogeny. This contrasts with orogenic magmatism that occurs at convergent plate boundaries where continental collision, subduction and orogeny are common.Anorogenic magmatism in Dronning Maud Land (Antarctica) ==See also== * ==References== Category:Igneous petrology Category:Volcanism
title: Anorogenic magmatism
